data.oai_dc:dc: The Zuiderzeeland Water Board encompasses an area in the province of Flevoland and small parts of Overijssel and Friesland. It manages an area of about 150,000 ha and 2 lakes: the Vollenhovermeer and Kadoelermeer.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl25,164 records (March 2018)
